name: Electric Rebirth
description: When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character gains Immunity to Defeat, and heals them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 Electro DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character gains $[K54], and heals them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 $[K104].

After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.
